features: High Absorption & High Dose Liposomal Vitamin C 1200mg* - Simply Potent Liposomal Vitamin C supplements contain Vit C encapsulated within liposomes of Sunflower Lecithin & Phosphatidylcholine. The liposomes protect Vitamin C against destruction by stomach acids, thus ensuring safe delivery & higher bioavailability.*

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is Liposomal Vitamin C? Vitamin C AKA Ascorbic acid is a naturally occurring compound that is responsible for various functions within the human body. From strengthening the immune system by playing a key role in the immune response to toxins and pathogens to promoting skin and heart health, Vitamin C is definitely vital to good health. If you fail to meet the daily minimum, you may suffer from weak defence, skin problems, and even heart troubles and other issues. In case your regular diet fails to provide you with the minimum required values of Vitamin C, the most common consequence is compromised resistance and increased chances of diseases. To avoid this, consuming daily Vitamin C supplements can prove to be beneficial in increasing your ability to resist diseases and overall health. While many types of Vitamin C supplements are available, Liposomal Vitamin C formulations have shown higher efficiency and absorbability. Encapsulated within globules of fat called liposomes, once consumed, Vitamin C droplets at the centre of the liposomes are then easily absorbed within the digestive system as they are fat-soluble.

Our product provides 1200mg per serving which makes it highly potent. Simply Potent’s proprietary formula uses phospholipids derived from sunflower and avoids soy lecithin, a common additive in some other supplements which is typically derived from genetically modified soy. Our product is completely free of gluten and preservatives and uses non-GMO ingredients only. Simply Potent Liposomal Vitamin C not only gives you the best liposomal technology to efficiently deliver Vitamin C to your bloodstream. Our product also packs several benefits which include the following - Free radical neutralization, which will help your body fight harmful cells*. It also acts as a powerful antioxidant*Helps with dilating and maintaining blood vessels which could help heart health*With regular consumption, Vitamin C acts as a discomfort-alleviating agent which will support the immune system*Encouraging neurotransmitter production which will help disposition and vitality*Aids collagen production and helps skin health*.Helps maintain optimum glucose levels*Supports tissue oxygenation which in turn helps lung function*

Simply Potent Resveratrol Simply Potent ACV Gummies Simply Potent Adrenal Support Simply Potent Immune Support Simply Potent Lung Support Ideal for Antioxidant aid, supports immune health, cognitive abilities, skin & hair health. Immunity, weight management, mental focus & energy, appetite management Adrenal wellness, stress-relief, anxiety-management, metabolism & immunity. Boosted immune defense, respiratory support, digestive health, and antioxidant support Lung Health, Respiratory & Bronchial Support Key ingredients Resveratrol with Black Pepper. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality vitamin
reviews.reviewText: I've tried many different brands of vitamins and these for vitamin C are the best. Super easy to swallow, no odd aftertaste or smell. They work very well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and non-irritating.
reviews.reviewText: It is a good vitamin C. It is easy on the stomac, does not cause irritation. Hopefully, it absorbs very well, as promised. However, I noticed that since I started to take it a couple of months ago, I had two episodes of respiratory infections two times, and both times I did not get sick all that much and the simptoms cleared within two or three days. It must be that the vitamin C helps my immune system fight infections. I strogly tecommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Liposomal C is the best
reviews.reviewText: Great product, high quality ingredients, no stomach upset, very easily absorbed. I am a nurse, and always refuse the flu shot. Instead, I dose up on vitamin C, and never get the flu. Highly recommend this product, it is a great value for the price and very effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it that no vitamin C is lost to the digestive process .
reviews.reviewText: My body benefits from all of the vitamin C that i paid for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: I think this is a quality product unlike the many vitamin C products that are plain ascorbic acid. This company has a formula that utilizes different forms and higher absorbency. This is the second time I have ordered and will continue ordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scars and liver spots say good bye at 53 years of age
reviews.reviewText: As a diabetic of 43 years, I've done pretty well. I can still see and pee and have all my feet and toes. I recently learned how high dose vitamin C can get rid of those age spots that mar our complexion as we get older. I had a big dark spot on my face go away and today I looked down at my feet and one of two scars was gone and the other was going. They had been there for several years. and They say diabetics don't heal well. Our bodies need Vitamin C to make collagen and to keep our skin healthy we all need more than the RDA, but Diabetics even more so. Diabetics use up our vitamin C quicker than most other people and it is a strong anti-oxidant. Even though I am doing fairly well, I did have a heart attack 10 years ago. My arteries were brittle and since I wasn't taken vitamin C at that time, my body didn't have the materials to repair and keep my arteries flexible. I take this Liposomal C and I also take another Vitamin C 1:1. I have taken up to 40,000 mg in a day spread out throughout the course of the day. Like 2,000 and hour. No ill effects and with some pleasant surprises such as I described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More energy and a feeling of wellness
reviews.reviewText: I am taking this, as recommended by our Dr. friend, and it is something I will continue even after and when the CoVid crisis ends. Not only does it make me feel better but has also helped my digestive issues to a degree. Any little 'degrees' of help I can get are a bonus.I have remained healthy in spite of being 'out there' working and could possibly have been in contact with the CoVid virus. Haven't had any health issues at all since last Dec. when a bunch of us co workers had bronchitis. I tried another brand of Liposomal Vit C and it was not as effective as this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value high absorbion
reviews.reviewText: I had a heart attack a few years ago and came across Linus Pauling research on how high doses of vitamin c can prevent and reverse build ups in the ateries. This product using the liposomal technology delivery system allows me to get high levels into my bloodstream for a very affordable price by bypassing my stomach. I take 4 capsules a day and intend on doing it forever.
Arrived safety and packed nicely. Thank you very much ! I dont know if it is working but I am still taking them :)
